availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, resident. Henry County, Kentucky, native. Son of Simeon Rains and Winnifred Rains. Resident in Owen County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident in Henry County in 1860. Served in the 54th Kentucky Infantry as a private from September 30, 1864, to September 1, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 1, p. 253A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 329.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 462.
Find A Grave, "John Rains (1844-1935)," Memorial #87120362, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/87120362 (accessed June 30, 2020).
KYR-0001-004-0318.
